pages.about-us: About MountainCrest Hotel Resort - Experience Luxury and Serenity MountainCrest HOME About Us Casino Contact Us About MountainCrest Hotel Resort At MountainCrest, we offer a sanctuary of luxury and tranquility nestled amidst breathtaking landscapes. Our resort is renowned for its exceptional hospitality, world-class amenities, and unparalleled natural beauty. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway, family vacation, or corporate retreat, MountainCrest provides an unforgettable experience. Explore our elegantly appointed rooms, indulge in gourmet dining, and rejuvenate at our spa and wellness center. With a commitment to excellence, we ensure every guest's stay is nothing short of extraordinary. Our Luxurious Rooms Discover our exquisite selection of hotel rooms designed to offer unparalleled comfort and style. Each room is thoughtfully crafted to provide a serene retreat amidst the beauty of MountainCrest. Explore our offerings and book your perfect getaway today! Deluxe Mountain View Room Starting from $200.00/night BOOK NOW Executive Suite Starting from $300.00/night BOOK NOW Luxury Oceanfront Villa Starting from $500.00/night BOOK NOW Family Suite Starting from $400.00/night BOOK NOW Indulge in Culinary Delights At MountainCrest Hotel Resort, dining is more than just a meal; it's an experience. Our chefs craft exquisite dishes using locally sourced ingredients, ensuring each bite is a celebration of flavor and freshness. Choose from our diverse dining options, from casual eateries to elegant restaurants overlooking breathtaking views. Whether you're enjoying breakfast with a sunrise or a romantic dinner under the stars, our dining experience promises to delight your senses. Explore Dining Options Discover Our Location Situated amidst the picturesque mountains, MountainCrest Hotel Resort offers a perfect blend of serenity and adventure. Explore the natural beauty of our surroundings, from lush forests to sparkling lakes, providing an ideal backdrop for outdoor activities and relaxation. Discover local attractions such as hiking trails, scenic viewpoints, and cultural landmarks just a short distance from our resort. Whether you prefer adventure or relaxation, MountainCrest offers an unforgettable escape in every season. The MountainCrest website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. While we strive to provide only quality links to useful and ethical websites, we have no control over the content and nature of these sites. These links to other websites do not imply a recommendation for all the content found on these sites. pages.privacy-policy: MountainCrest Hotel Resort - Privacy Policy MountainCrest HOME About Us Casino Contact Us Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is MountainCrest Hotel Resort's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or modification. We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies. You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services. Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us. The MountainCrest website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline FortifyCases Navigation Home Products About Us Information Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimers
